name: Top Fighter 2
description:
Battle it out in the parking lot with your spinning top! In Top Fighter 2, you must defeat various enemies in a tournament in order to crown yourself the champion! Also, play against an enemy of your choice (or a friend of yours) in Sandbox mode!

Do not ask about Top Fighter 1.


Made by Derek Reynolds for the Illinois State Summer 2022 Game Jam.
Top designs created by Alison Weiser! Thank you!
Music and all other assets were created by me.
